document.discussion_title: Rupee recovers 2 paise vs US dollar in early trade
document.topic_text:
MUMBAI: The rupee recovered by 2 paise to 66.83 against the dollar in early trade on Friday on mild selling of the US currency by exporters amidst higher opening in the domestic equity market.
Forex dealers said dollars
